reviews.review_msg: Worst professor I've ever had.  What a joke.

The best prof I've ever had at SFU!  I recommend Peter to all my friends.  He is a genius -- very intelligent and funny and super well-read.  I loved every moment of his lectures and learned so much from the assignments.  Only people of low intelligence who didn't do the readings would not like his classes!
please listen to the comments below, they are very true.  it's sad that someone like this teaches at sfu, it really gives the school a bad reputation.  he's a worn stereotype, with poor ideas.
One of the worst classes I've ever had.
